attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The No vote by the Republic of Ireland has shown us the way a democracy should work. It is time to stand up and say that we in Britain do not want to be bullied into accepting a Treaty which is in essence the same Constitution rejected by France and the Netherlands.
We demand the right to democracy, we demand to right for our views to be listened to.
We demand to right to govern ourselves

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
